GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
wifi: ath9k: hif_usb: fix memory leak of urbs in ath9k_hif_usb_dealloc_tx_urbs()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit d856f7574bcc1d81de565a857caf32f122cd7ce0, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 03fb92a432ea5abe5909bca1455b7e44a9380480. For more details please see the references link.
